concept.title: GCTANGENT Command
concept.shortdesc: Creates a tangent geometric constraint on 2D entities.

conbody.p: Create a tangent constraint to ensure curved entities remain tangent to another curved or linear entity.

section.title: Methods to create a tangent constraint
section.p:
There is one method to begin creating a tangent constraint:
Select first entity

dlentry.dd: Begin creating a tangent constraint by selecting a linear or curved entity then:

Select a second entity to make tangent to the first. The first entity maintains its position while the second entity moves, as necessary, to become tangent to the first entity. At least one curved entity must be selected per tangent constraint.
